trans-unit.source: Creatures can't block. Whenever chaos ensues, draw a card for each land you control.
trans-unit.target: Creatures can't block. Whenever chaos ensues, draw a card for each land you control.

trans-unit.resname: PHOP路P1 | Stairs to Infinity | Card Name
PHOP路P1 | Stairs to Infinity | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Players have no maximum hand size. Whenever you roll the planar die, draw a card. Whenever you roll chaos, reveal the top card of your planar deck. You may put it on the bottom of your planar deck.
trans-unit.target: Players have no maximum hand size. Whenever you roll the planar die, draw a card. Whenever you roll chaos, reveal the top card of your planar deck. You may put it on the bottom of your planar deck.
